job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate directly with clients to collect and comprehend business needs, translating them into efficient CPQ configurations.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the process of understanding client requirements and translating them into technical configurations, which is a core aspect of business understanding in a consulting context.

job_tasks.phrase: Your role will involve configuring CPQ solutions by engaging directly with clients to grasp their business needs and converting them into effective configurations.
job_tasks.justification: This is a restatement of the previous point, emphasizing client interaction to understand business needs for configuration, aligning with Business Understanding.

job_tasks.phrase: Manage the full scope of CPQ system configuration, ensuring it aligns with client requirements and adheres to best practices.
job_tasks.justification: CPQ (Configure, Price, Quote) systems are software applications. Managing their configuration, alignment with requirements, and best practices falls under the domain of building and integrating software solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: leverage AI-driven automation to optimize workflows.
job_tasks.justification: Leveraging AI to automate workflows implies building or integrating AI capabilities into existing systems, which is a form of software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Utilize AI tools and methodologies to automate repetitive tasks, boost configuration efficiency, and enhance project delivery.
job_tasks.justification: The use of AI tools to automate tasks and enhance project delivery involves the application and integration of technology, fitting within Software Development.

soft_skills.phrase: Do you excel at solving complex problems with a hands-on approach and a knack for technology?
Thriving in this position requires a commitment to continuous learning, especially in AI and CPQ.
If you thrive in dynamic environments
Collaborate directly with clients to collect and comprehend business needs
engaging directly with clients to grasp their business needs

classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on CPQ configuration and client business needs, with AI mentioned primarily as a tool for automation within these existing systems. It lacks the core responsibilities and projects typical of a GenAI Engineer, such as fine-tuning LLMs, RAG systems, or building agents.
